articles.author: Sean Lyngaas
articles.title: US government review faults Microsoft for ‘cascade’ of errors that allowed Chinese hackers to breach senior US officials’ emails - CNN
articles.description: Microsoft committed a “cascade” of “avoidable errors” that allowed Chinese hackers to breach the tech giant’s network and later the email accounts of senior US officials last year, including the secretary of commerce, a scathing US government-backed review of…
articles.content: Microsoft committed a cascade of avoidable errors that allowed Chinese hackers to breach the tech giants network and later the email accounts of senior US officials last year, including the secretary… [+3013 chars]
